description:
Gloves to help you keep control of the rope when belaying. They protected your hands too when cleaning, climbing via ferrata, or hammering on aid lines.

  • Breathable stretch mesh fabric and cush knuckle padding
  • Synthetic leather palms and fingers. Reinforced index fingers and thumbs add durability
  • Hook-and-loop cuff closures
  • Clip-in loop
name: Black Diamond Crag Gloves - Unisex
